title: 1BR + Dishwasher, W/D, Balcony. Gramercy. No Broker Fee!
posting_body: ['Please note: This is not available for a short term rental.', '12 month leases only!', 'Amenities: Pets, Laundry, Hardwood Floors, Street Parking, Outdoor Space, Dishwasher, Floor 5 Walk-up, High CeilingsVideo Tour:\xa0https://youtu.be/t_UVnoiWk4s', 'Only 2 blocks to the 4, 6 trains!', '<URL> gives our landlord paid broker commission of $3,095 to you,', 'reducing your', 'monthly rent to $3,537 (Gross rent is $3,795)', '.', 'Padspin is the only company in the US that does this.', 'We are fighting to keep rents low and get rid of brokers.', 'Renovated 1 Bedroom with balcony, dishwasher and washer/dryer located in the heart of Gramercy.', 'Steps from multiple train lines, laundromat, shops, galleries, restaurants, lounges, cafes, etc.', 'Priced to rent immediately.', 'If interested contact right away to schedule a viewing before it goes.', 'Requirements', '1.', 'Everyone on lease has a combined annual income of at least $140,000.', '2.', 'Everyone on lease has a credit score of at least 670.', '3.', 'Or you have a guarantor(s) with credit score(s) of at least 685 and combined annual income of at least $190,000.', '4.', 'Or you have savings of 4 months worth of rent or more.']
